title: Anxiety Management Practice
description: Practice helping a client manage anxiety symptoms. This scenario will help you develop active listening skills and learn to apply cognitive behavioral techniques.

steps.title: Introduction & Rapport Building
steps.description: Greet the client warmly and establish a comfortable therapeutic relationship

steps.title: Initial Assessment
steps.description: Ask open-ended questions to understand the client's anxiety symptoms and triggers

steps.title: Intervention & Coping Strategies
steps.description: Introduce breathing techniques and cognitive reframing strategies

steps.title: Summary & Next Steps
steps.description: Summarize the session and provide homework or follow-up recommendations
